channel.title: Github on Wenbo Lv
channel.description: Recent content in Github on Wenbo Lv

item.title: Common git commands
item.description: View the git installation location which git View the git installation version git --version Updating Git for Windows git update-git-for-windows Setting up network proxy git config --global http.proxy 'http://127.0.0.1:7890' git config --global https.proxy 'http://127.0.0.1:7890' Setting default initial branch name to main git config --global init.defaultBranch main View all git configuration information git config --global --list Push local main to GitHub main and have local main track main on GitHub git push --set-upstream origin main # shorter form git push -u origin main # you only need to set upstream tracking once!
